name: Mega Mawile
disruptions:
Board: Random number of Eevees
Initial: None
Timer: Adds 4 Metal Blocks after 2 turns x2. Adds 1 row of Barrier every 2 turns
recommendedParty:
[Lucario]/[Garchomp]

Combusken,
Torchic, Phanpy

Moltres, Blaziken,
Entei, Heatran

Garchomp, Groudon
clearingStrategy:
This stage is almost impossible
without items. Buy Disruption
Delay + Move+5 to clear it 
for now. Make sure to combo
with your Pyre Team. You are
stuck with Sableye as Mega as
the other are not very effective

Note: If you have Event Pokemon, this
will be piece of cake now. M-Luke can
beat this itemless
srankingStrategy:
Moves: At least 10 moves left

M-Lucario + Move+5 can beat this without
issue (decent Pokemon Level)

Move+5, Disruption Delay and (optional)
Mega Start to clear this without issue. Also
with a decent team (if you are using Main
Pokemon)
ability: Mega Effects: Erases Pokémon with three lines from upper right to lower left.
